Actions.Name: Create a record
Actions.Description: Create a record in a table. JSON record needs to be passed.

Actions.Name: Delete a record
Actions.Description: Delete a record in a table. Provide Record ID to select a record.

Actions.Name: List Records
Actions.Description: List Records in table. Returned records do not include any fields with empty values. You can filter, sort, and format the results with the parameters.

Actions.Name: Retrieve a record
Actions.Description: Retrieve a record in a table. Any empty fields (e.g. [], or false) in the record will not be returned.

Actions.Name: Update a record
Actions.Description: Update a record in a table. It will only update the fields provided and leave the rest as they were.
